caption: b'No matter where you\xe2\x80\x99re working from, we\xe2\x80\x99re sending warm thoughts and December spirit from our Headquarters in Denmark :Christmas_tree:#holidayseason'

b"Amazing to see all the #DiabetesAwarenessMonth activities all around the world\xc2\xa0:blue_heart: Thanks to everyone who has helped raise awareness for people living with #diabetes and their families\xc2\xa0- especially in these challenging times. Let's keep #changingdiabetes all year round! :flexed_biceps:"

b'Today kids from @UNICEF_DK are taking over our account to raise their voices on #WorldChildrensDay :speaking_head:With #COVID19 and lockdowns across the globe, it is as important as ever to be reminded that every child has a right to thrive and succeed. Check out our stories to hear what the kids have to say and let\xe2\x80\x99s reimagine the world through their eyes :eye:'

b'Congratulations, Mads! :party_popper: Thank you for your passion and for being our enthusiastic Chief Scientific Officer for the last 20 years :microscope: Here\xe2\x80\x99s to many more years of #innovation for people with #diabetes and other serious chronic diseases :flexed_biceps: #ChangingDiabetes #Science #Research #Anniversary'
b'From across the world, we wish all of you a great #WorldDiabetesDay! Take care and stay safe everyone :blue_heart: #diabetesawarenessmonth #diabetesawareness #changingdiabetes'

b'A huge thank you to @hannadiabetesexpert, @whatthebetes, @lifesportdiabetes and @blackdiabeticinfo for an exciting and lively virtual discussion on the latest thinking around the science of #diabetes - including time in range, telemedicine and beta cell replacement :microscope: We enjoyed getting a fresh perspective on the science from true experts managing their #diabetes daily :blue_heart: #diabetesawarenessmonth #diabetesresearch #science'

b'Here it is :backhand_index_pointing_right: the brand :NEW_button: @teamnovonordisk kit! In 2021, the world\xe2\x80\x99s first all diabetes professional cycling team will be racing in a jersey that is fit for a community of champions. The look might be different, but the mission stays the same \xe2\x80\x93 to inspire, educate and empower people affected by #diabetes :flexed_biceps: You can pre-order your very own kit here teamnovonordisk.sportyfied.com  #ChangingDiabetes'

b'Exactly :hundred_points: years ago, our co-founder August Krogh was awarded the #NobelPrize in Physiology and Medicine for the discovery of the mechanism of regulation of the capillaries in skeletal muscle. 

The Nobel Prize brought his work international acclaim, and it was out of respect for his scientific achievements that he was given the permission to bring insulin treatment from Canada to Scandinavia.

In 1923, August went on to found the Nordisk Insulin Lab, and so began the story of our company - a story that continues to this day :blue_heart: #science #research #history #physiology #medicine #changingdiabetes'

b'Do this architect and this chair look familiar to you? The iconic Danish architect and interior designer Arne Jacobsen designed the famous \xe2\x80\x9cAnt\xe2\x80\x9d chair :ant: that is now a bestselling product sold in millions of copies worldwide. But did you know that the chair was first produced for our canteen back in 1952? The Novo canteen was entirely his work with everything from curtains, tables, chairs and lamps being his design. We\xe2\x80\x99re truly grateful for the collaboration we had with Arne Jacobsen and still love to have the chair in our canteens today :folded_hands: #ThrowbackThursday #danishdesign #arnejacobsen #architecture'

b'Say hello :waving_hand: to Joachim, Anders, Karen and Camilla - our four new colleagues joining us as part of Project Opportunity! We\xe2\x80\x99re very excited to welcome them to our employment programme that seeks to match existing job vacancies with the unique skills and competencies of people living with autism spectrum disorder (#ASD) :handshake: #autismawareness #diversityandinclusion #lifechangingcareers'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s #WorldHeartDay :red_heart_selector: Did you know that taking care of cardiovascular health and type 2 diabetes together can save lives? Help us spread awareness by applying the World Heart Day Filter :smiling_face_with_3_hearts:'

b'In connection with #ClimateWeek and #WorldCleanUpDay, our colleagues in France and their families have been on the streets in Paris to collect waste :litter_in_bin_sign: Thanks for caring for the environment \xe2\x80\x93 every cigarette butt and plastic piece collected count! :green_heart: #worldcleanupday2020'

b'Many of you have already laced up your shoes :running_shoe: and joined the #5KEASD virtual challenge from around the world :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: It\xe2\x80\x99s not too late to sign up and take part to support #ChangingDiabetes :flexed_biceps: Go to @5keasd and register! #EASD2020'

b'We kick off #climateweek by asking all our 60,000 direct suppliers to provide their goods and services using 100 % renewable power by 2030 :recycling_symbol_selector: Learn more on :backhand_index_pointing_right: www.novonordisk.com #circularforzero #sustainability'
b'Our Headquarters in Denmark has turned orange to mark #WorldPatientSafetyDay :orange_heart: Stay safe, everyone!'

b"Please join us in welcoming our new generation of graduates! :graduation_cap:\n\nWe\xe2\x80\x99ve had the pleasure of welcoming 47 extremely bright and ambitious graduates representing 25 different nationalities :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: For the first time ever, we hosted a virtual welcome speech with our CEO Lars Fruergaard J\xc3\xb8rgensen and kept the distancing rule, but it didn't in any way affect the excitement in the air :raising_hands: #lifechangingcareers #graduate"

b"We're proud to extend our partnership with @teamnovonordisk through 2023 and support the first-ever all-diabetes professional cycling team in their mission to inspire, educate and empower everyone affected by #diabetes :flexed_biceps::bicycle::blue_heart: #ChangingDiabetes"

b'Takeover! :selfie: Hi there. I\xe2\x80\x99m Michael Tannery, and I work as a personal assistant in Global People & Organisation in Headquarters, Denmark. I\xe2\x80\x99m Asian-American, and married to Mads (who\xe2\x80\x99s Danish, and also works for Novo Nordisk). Life keeps us occupied as we\xe2\x80\x99re busy raising our bouncy 3-year old twin boys :red_heart_selector:
 
I\xe2\x80\x99m a co-pilot of NovoPride, which is a group of LGBTQ+ colleagues here in Novo Nordisk :rainbow: Our group believes that in order for Novo Nordisk to have a sustainable workplace, everybody needs to feel welcome, and have equal opportunities to be able to deliver their best and realise their individual potential. We welcome all facets of diversity and inclusion - not just sexual orientation and gender identity. We are of the opinion that when our company\xe2\x80\x99s composition reflects the reality of what the world is out there, then we can truly listen to the patients and address their needs.
 
As this is #CopenhagenPride Week, Novo Nordisk is flying rainbow flags as a symbol of the company\xe2\x80\x99s commitment to an inclusive and diverse workplace :rainbow_flag_selector: When we wave that rainbow flag, we in the LGBTQ+ community do it to honor those who\xe2\x80\x99ve sacrificed so much before us, as they brought us miles ahead into where we are now, and we wave that flag to show hope to the heartbroken and those who still find themselves oppressed because of who they are. We lend our voices to those who don\xe2\x80\x99t have a voice, and we share our stories on behalf of those who can\xe2\x80\x99t.
 
I welcome your thoughts and questions, as I do a takeover the Instagram account for the day. All ideas and opinions expressed herein are purely my own. Thank you for reading and come join my takeover in Stories! :raising_hands: #CPHpride #HappyPride'
b'Happy #CopenhagenPride week  to everyone! :rainbow_flag_selector: #CPHpride'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating #CopenhagenPride Week! :rainbow_flag: Meet some of our great colleagues from NovoPride in this video and hear more about our approach to diversity and inclusion. Happy Pride to everyone! :rainbow:'

b'Our colleagues in Lebanon have been on the ground to support the citizens affected by the destroying #beirutexplosion. They have delivered food, necessities and provided emotional support. Our thoughts go out to everyone affected :red_heart_selector:'

b'The increased need for covid-19 screenings in the US has created a shortage of personal protective equipment in several places across the country. Colleagues at our production site in Clayton, North Carolina have donated 3,000 gowns, 10,000 K95 masks and hand sanitizer for distribution to various local testing sites. We are proud to be able to support the fight against #COVID19 :blue_heart:'

b'Meet our Helpline Heroes! 18 of our colleagues in the UK who are diabetes specialist nurses have supported @nhsengland and @diabetesuk to launch The NHS Diabetes Clinical Advice Helpline. The helpline supports people with #diabetes and their families who have concerns about their condition during the #COVID19 outbreak. Thanks to all involved for the work you do :folded_hands:'
b'Thanks to @teamnovonordisk rider @vaclav.snuparek for making this #StravaArt while  #ChangingDiabetes on the bike! :blue_heart::raising_hands::man_biking_selector:'

b'Might there come a day when insulin pens can be re-purposed after use? We hope so :green_heart:

In the recent years, we have done a few pilots to explore how our pen devices can be re-purposed. We have invented a machine, which automatically sorts the different parts of the insulin pen, and we have entered in to partnerships with design companies, which have created e.g. chairs and lamps using plastic and glass from discarded insulin pens. 

In the coming years, we hope to find a scalable solution and launch a take back programme, which will allow all of our insulin pens to have a second life :recycling_symbol_selector:

Read more on www.novonordisk.com

#circularforzero #circulareconomy #reducereuserecycle'

b'#PrideMonth :rainbow: may be drawing to a close but inclusion and equality remain year-round priorities. Together with our LGBTQ+ community (meet some of them in this video :backhand_index_pointing_up:), we are focused on ensuring an inclusive and diverse workplace throughout the year. Always a major milestone is #CopenhagenPride Week in August and we are looking forward to it already! :rainbow_flag_selector: Our best wishes to everyone celebrating and taking a stand.'

b'How can we best support people living with #diabetes in light of #COVID19? Today, our Executive Vice President, Camilla Sylvest, was live :movie_camera: on our LinkedIn and Facebook to answer this question with Cristina Petrut, member of The Romanian Diabetes Association. You can watch the full discussion on the two platforms and post your comments or questions :speech_balloon:'

b'Diabetes advocate @saramoback and health psychologist Prof. Tim Skinner discuss how people living with #diabetes can manage the emotional impact of the #covid19 crisis :blue_heart: Thanks for sharing your experiences and advise! :folded_hands: Watch the full discussion on YouTube :backhand_index_pointing_right: \xe2\x80\x98Diabetes, COVID-19 and emotional well-being\xe2\x80\x99'
b'Wishing all the dads out there a Happy International Father\xe2\x80\x99s Day! :family_man_girl_boy: #fathersday'

b'Thank you to everyone who joined us for the #5KADA run/walk all over the world this weekend to raise diabetes awareness! :running_shoe::flexed_biceps::blue_heart: #ADA2020 #ChangingDiabetes #diabetes #5K'

b'We have planted almost 3,000 spruces in Joutsa, Finland, together with @taimiteko project:evergreen_tree::Finland: On top of compensating our CO2 emissions, we\xe2\x80\x99re also proud to provide many young people a summer job, planting seedlings, in these special times :green_heart:\n\n#circularforzero #environment #sustainability #taimiteko #4HSuomi'

b'CONGRATULATIONS to the winner of our Innovation Challenge: @genecis_bioindustries from Toronto! :1st_place_medal: By upcycling yeast waste from insulin production to bioplastics, this #innovation holds the potential to close the loop and make our production truly circular :recycling_symbol_selector: Thanks to everyone involved. We\xe2\x80\x99re super excited to further collaborate on achieving zero environmental impact with you! :green_heart: #circularforzero #circulardesign'
b'It is a key part of our company values to treat everyone with respect :black_heart:'

b'Defeating diabetes has never been as important as it is right now :oncoming_fist: If we do nothing, 1 in 9 people around the world may have the disease by 2045. Together with partners, all of us at @NovoNordisk are ready to #defeatdiabetes through prevention, innovation and by making insulin more accessible worldwide :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: Learn more about our new social responsibility strategy here :backhand_index_pointing_right:\nwww.novonordisk.com/defeatdiabetes'

b'Happy International #ClinicalTrialsDay from all of us at Novo Nordisk! :blue_heart: Thank you to all who participate in #clinicaltrials. You make it possible to develop products for the future :raising_hands: #ICTD2020'

b'#COVID19 has created many new challenges that require us to think differently. Our colleague Ulla Thomsen has used her knowledge and spare time to invent a \xe2\x80\x98conversation box\xe2\x80\x99 that allows residents at nursing homes to meet their family members in a safe way :red_heart_selector: #staysafestayhealthy'

b"Q&A in stories on living with #diabetes during #lockdown :backhand_index_pointing_up: 
Hi everyone I'm @renzas (blogger at Diabetogenic). I live in Melbourne and have been living with diabetes since 1998. I\xe2\x80\x99m passionate about promoting a person-centred approach to healthcare and the development of diabetes information and technologies. I\xe2\x80\x99d love to answer any questions you have for me about living with diabetes during lockdown, especially with restrictions around the world starting to ease. Why not head over to stories and ask away! :speech_balloon: 
This is a sponsored activity with Novo Nordisk but views are all mine. 
#diabetesunfiltered #QA #diabetesduringlockdown #sponsored #covid19"

b'Since the first donation of 20 tonnes of ethanol in March, we have now donated additional 450 tonnes of ethanol from our production facility in Kalundborg, Denmark, which will be manufactured into about 525,000 liter #handsanitiser :raised_back_of_hand: #COVID19'
b'Happy #MothersDay and big kudos to all mothers who balance work and parenting during this #lockdown period :flexed_biceps: Stay strong and hang in there! :red_heart_selector:'

b"Q&A in stories on living with diabetes during #lockdown :backhand_index_pointing_up:

Hi everyone I'm Phyllisa (aka @blackdiabeticinfo)! I live in Florida :U.S._Outlying_Islands: and have been living with diabetes since 2011. I'm super passionate about supporting and empowering people to live well with diabetes, especially during #lockdown, so go ahead and ask me a question over on stories today!

This is a sponsored activity with Novo Nordisk but views are all mine. #diabetesunfiltered #qa #diabetesduringlockdown #sponsored #covid"

b'Really cool to do a rooftop #marathon during #lockdown while also donating to the health heroes of NYC :man_running_selector:Well done @rundiabetes! :raising_hands: #ChangingDiabetes @teamnovonordisk'
b'We are marking #WorldHaemophiliaDay with red initiatives all over the world from our home offices to help raise awareness for people living with #haemophilia :heart_exclamation: #WHD2020'

b'Together with International Committee of the Red Cross - @icrc and @rodekorsdk we\xe2\x80\x99re responding to #COVID19 worldwide to help ensure that vital diabetes care is maintained in the face of the ongoing pandemic :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: We\xe2\x80\x99re also offering insulin free of charge and shipment to all humanitarian organisations that normally procure our insulins :blue_heart:'

b'Inside our facilities in M\xc3\xa5l\xc3\xb8v, Denmark, colleagues are helping with #COVID19 tests and keeping our manufacturing and supply going. Outside we have just planted 24.000 trees and can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to see them grow! :deciduous_tree: #circularforzero #treeplanting'

b'Great to see how our equipment is being used around the world to support the fight against #COVID19 :red_heart_selector: From sanitiser and protective equipment for hospitals in Denmark and Tunisia, to our 3D printers to make masks in Brazil. Keep up the good work everyone! :flexed_biceps: #coronavirus'
b'Step inside one of our laboratories and meet our hardworking colleagues who are volunteering to carry out #COVID19 testing :blue_heart: #coronavirus'

b'THANK YOU SO MUCH for hanging out with me in the Stories today! :grinning_face_with_big_eyes:
.
It\xe2\x80\x99s been such a pleasure to share my #dayinthelife with diabetes during lockdown. Some challenges, many successes and lots, and lots of fun.:star-struck:
.
If you missed the Stories, please check them out in the Highlights, they\xe2\x80\x99ll be there for a bit. And, if you liked what I was sharing, why don\xe2\x80\x99t you come over and follow me at @hannadiabetesexpert :raising_hands_medium-light_skin_tone:
.
Thanks again and have a happy weekend! :sparkles: Stay strong, stay healthy, stay home. :folded_hands_medium-light_skin_tone:
.
This is a sponsored activity by Novo Nordisk. Views are my own. #diabetesunfiltered #dayinthelife #diabetesduringlockdown #sponsored #covid19 #lockdown'

b'INSTAGRAM TAKEOVER - A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
.
Hi :waving_hand_medium-light_skin_tone: my name is Hanna Bo\xc3\xabthius @hannadiabetesexpert ! I\xe2\x80\x99ve lived with Type 1 Diabetes as my constant companion for 35 years, since I was 2 (despite CLEARLY only being 25, right?! :winking_face:) I love helping people with diabetes to get healthier, happier and more confident in their own care. I also love creating healthful magic in the form of big events.
.
I\xe2\x80\x99m a speaker, a writer and an advocate for #t1d. In fact, being on stage and sharing what I\xe2\x80\x99ve learned on my journey is one of my favorite things to do! Workshops, meet ups and sharing what I know in other ways are definitely up there, too.
.
My base is just outside Z\xc3\xbcrich, Switzerland :Switzerland: with my husband. We (normally) travel a lot, as we are both fortunate enough to work for ourselves AND only need a good internet connection to do so. I\xe2\x80\x99m so grateful for that opportunity - I love traveling and discovering new places, foods, cultures and people.
.
I\xe2\x80\x99m an avid real food-foodie and love all types of food, particularly those that help make my blood glucose easier to manage. I\xe2\x80\x99m also known to enjoy the odd glass of wine (or bubbly).
.
I\xe2\x80\x99m determined to reach goals I set for myself, which comes in handy being an entrepreneur and all. At the same time, it\xe2\x80\x99s incredibly important for me to enjoy everything life has to offer.
.
If you ask me, Diabetes is a holistic thing to deal with, so treating it with simply medication, food and exercise is cutting yourself short. There is the whole mind-body component to it, as well as hydration, proper nutritional supplements, and, of course, stress management (HUGE blood sugar killer!), amongst others.
.
I hope to motivate at least one of you today by sharing snapshots of my life, diabetes, movement, food, tips and tricks\xe2\x80\xa6 You know, the usual, but in a lockdown situation.
.
Jump onto the Novo Nordisk stories throughout the day to see how I cope during #lockdown. Looking forward to seeing you there!
.
I\xe2\x80\x99d love to learn more about you - tell me where you are in the world in a comment below!
.
This is a sponsored activity by Novo Nordisk. Views are my own. #diabetesunfiltered #dayinthelife  #diabetesduringlockdown #sponsored #covid19'

b'Colleagues all over the world have created innovative workout environments during #lockdown :person_cartwheeling: From taking advantage of living in a 17-story building to playing hockey on the driveway, here are some of our favorite workouts! :flexed_biceps: Stay healthy and safe out there :red_heart_selector: #workout #exercise #stayhomestaysafe #changingdiabetes'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re happy to share that 20 tonnes of ethanol have now been picked up from Novo Nordisk and is on its way to the production of hand sanitiser. Thanks to everyone involved :flexed_biceps: #covid_19 #corona'

b'Together we can defeat #COVID19! Our CEO Lars Fruergaard J\xc3\xb8rgensen has a message to you all about our response to the #coronavirus. Keep updated on :backhand_index_pointing_right: www.novonordisk.com and stay safe :blue_heart:'

b"Masks, hand sanitiser and testing capacity. We're committed to collaborate and help fight the #coronavirus :flexed_biceps: You can stay updated on our actions and contributions on www.novonordisk.com #covid19 #covid #covid_19"

b'During the global #coronavirus outbreak, our key priority is to safeguard the continued supply of our lifesaving medicines to patients. The situation is continually evolving, but currently we are not experiencing any supply constraints. We are well prepared for situations like this and have an inventory policy that serves long-term supply. This is important since our medicines are needed every day by patients all over the world :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: #COVID'

b'Happy Birthday to our former CEO, Mads \xc3\x98vlisen, who turns 80 today! :Denmark: Mads is a true pioneer in many ways \xe2\x80\x93 especially within #sustainability, where we are still building on his legacy every day :green_heart:'
b'Regardless of gender, we\xe2\x80\x99re all responsible for creating an equal world. Happy International Women\xe2\x80\x99s Day to you all! #IWD2020 #EachforEqual'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cCrossing the finish line was a completely thrilling experience and I\xe2\x80\x99m so ready to do it again!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 says our colleague Jens after racing 90 km through the snow! He and 75 colleagues from all over the world gathered in Sweden for a challenging cross-country ski race @vasaloppet :skier::clapping_hands::Sweden:#vasaloppet2020 #vasaloppet #nattvasan90 #ChangingDiabetes'

b'This World Obesity Day, check out the work of @abbiets, a photographer with personal experience of obesity, who has put a lens on the stories shared personally by people living with obesity. :right_arrow_selector: Swipe to see people with obesity sharing their stories in images and words. \xe2\x80\x98Obesity-The Truth from Within\xe2\x80\x99 has been initiated and funded by Novo Nordisk in collaboration with photographer Abbie Trayler-Smith. \n#WorldObesityDay #ChangingObesity'

b'When our colleague Cathrine heard how untreated #diabetes had claimed the life of a father-of-six living in a refugee camp in Greece, she was moved to take action :red_heart_selector: Setting up her own fundraising campaign, she put her life in Denmark as a busy mum-of-two on hold and travelled out to Greece with the humanitarian organisation Iris Center to spend five days as a fieldworker in Vial Refugee Camp. Thanks to her efforts, almost 43,000 Danish kroner and 600kg clothes and toys have now been donated to improve the lives of refugees. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to have inspirational colleagues like Cathrine! :flexed_biceps: #MondayMotivation #TakeAction #corporatevolunteering'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re very excited to let you know that @thegrumpypumper who lives with #type1diabetes will be taking over our @NovoNordiskLive Twitter channel today, sharing his views from #ATTD2020 diabetes tech conference in Madrid :selfie: Go to Twitter and join the conversation :speech_balloon: #GrumpsatATTD #diabetestechnology'

b'Our initiative with the Too Good To Go app to fight #foodwaste has been a great success, so we have now expanded to 25 of our canteens in Denmark :green_heart: Surplus food from our buffet lunches are safely packaged in biodegradable boxes and put on offer in the app for employees :green_salad::selfie: We will continue to take measures to this end towards becoming #circularforzero :recycling_symbol_selector: #fightfoodwaste #toogoodtogo'

b'On this #WomeninScience day:woman_scientist:, meet Johnna who leads a team of passionate colleagues working hard to find new therapies that can delay, prevent and even cure #type1diabetes :flexed_biceps: Learn more about how far we\xe2\x80\x99ve come on www.novonordisk.com :microscope:#WomeninScienceDay #WomeninMedicine #Science'

b'A pleasure to be in company of these sustainability superstars!:glowing_star:The start-ups Pond, @plastic.fri, @pulp.works, GRIN and @genecis_bioindustries are part of our Innovation Challenge and have been in Denmark this week to develop their green, innovative ideas of new sustainable materials and reuse of our products together with dedicated Novo Nordisk mentors :green_heart: The teams have exactly 12 weeks to further develop their prototypes, and the winner will be announced 23 April. Stay tuned! #innovation #sustainability #circulareconomy #circularforzero'

b'30 colleagues spent this weekend together with riders from @teamnovonordisk, all of whom race professionally with #type1diabetes :man_biking_selector: We\xe2\x80\x99re all in gear to inspire, educate and empower people affected by #diabetes across the world in 2020! :flexed_biceps: #ChangingDiabetes #roadcycling #T1D #T2D'

b'We cannot tackle childhood obesity alone \xe2\x80\x93 it is a shared responsibility that needs immediate action. Together with @unicef we gathered stakeholders across sectors at #WEF20 to identify solutions to the global challenge :handshake: #changingobesity #davos2020 #childhoodobesity'

b'This week, our CEO, Lars Fruergaard J\xc3\xb8rgensen, presented @julemaerket \xe2\x80\x93 a charity that helps children to adopt healthier lifestyles and strengthen their self-esteem - with a donation of 958,000 DKK. Through our Take Action programme, colleagues have been fundraising this amount throughout 2019 by carrying out many different volunteer activities :flexed_biceps: We look forward to continue our volunteer activities in 2020 to support the charity and the children! :blue_heart: #corporatevolunteering #takeaction #julem\xc3\xa6rkefonden #julem\xc3\xa6rkehjem'

b'In Denmark, when it\xe2\x80\x99s too far to walk to a meeting, we have the option to choose green, or even zero emissions, transportation methods thanks to new initiatives that offer: Novo Nordisk electric cars and shared cars from external, green suppliers + increased access to electric taxis + opportunities to lease and purchase electric bicycles :sport_utility_vehicle::taxi::bicycle:\nThese initiatives and many more around the world :globe_showing_Europe-Africa: give colleagues a chance to contribute to reaching our goal of zero environmental impact #circularforzero #sustainability #sustainabletransport #circulareconomy'

b'#Fridayfact :green_heart: A total of 90.000 m2 lawns at our sites were converted during 2019 to areas with a higher diversity of grasses and flowers largely left for nature to roam :herb: We look forward to the spring when the fields will bloom with colours and life! :honeybee::butterfly: :bug::blossom::cherry_blossom: #circularforzero #environment #sustainability #fieldflowers'
